name: Mischief, Atrocity & Malice Academy
description:
"Rose wants to become the best villainess... Will you be able to help her out?"

After a bunch of repeated sprites, dialog, and some bitsy assets I made before... This game made the 3 hours threshold!  (I completed the game after 2:37 hours exactly).
